urlLink AWESOME SHOW! Excellent story line that revolves around the 2 brothers. It's a MUST watch for everyone! Bring some tissue papers along too.. really touching..

urlLink It feels like sunday...
urlLink Happy 39th Bday Singapore! Was down at national stadium to celebrate our nation's 39th bday! So exciting! But got bad seats! fireworks were all behind us, blocked by those scafoldings too! ><

urlLink Time flies, 4 years have passed and now, looking back at the sweet memories of my primary school photos, then, we were lively, now, pierced body parts and mini skirts. We lived in a highly influential world and it'll would be against our own human nature not to pursue it, hopefully, we'll still remember where we came from, what we've learnt from our past mistakes, it is rather important, as now, canes are no longer used, NATO(no action, talk only) has taken over. Lets be nice, have the right attitude; live the right way.
urlLink That's Mr Tan! Putting on his blade and in the foreground, it's me on my bro's bike!

urlLink Went cycling today with Mr Tan CC, i must say.. a very effective workout for my lazy thighs, for him also! Hah! It's been long since the last time i've been there, enjoying the sea-breeze and the smell of burning charcoal relived me from the hectic life ^_^. That shot was taken at the jetty!
urlLink Celebrated nation's 39th bday in sch today, as usual.. running around taking " not so artistic " photos, manged to get some nice shots though. Whee! Long weekend! got to study! Boo.
urlLink " but is this burning.. an eternal flame... say my name, sunshines through the rain, of all life so lonely, then come and ease the pain, i don't want to lose this feeling.. " - Eternal Flames
